text:
This week, @GovKemp announced that Georgia is the #1  state for business for a remarkable 10th year in a row! 

This is a testament to all the hardworking folks of the Peach State - and I’m very proud to see this amazing success!
Enjoyed seeing my friend Stuart Countess from Kia last Wednesday! Always great to hear about the positive impact @Kia continues to have on our state.

The #PASTEURAct brings together the public & private sectors to research & develop strong and effective antibiotics.

Appreciate the opportunity to join the @HarvardChanSPH #AMR event to discuss this vital legislation.

Georgia is home to the country’s largest tankless water heater assembly facility, & @ENERGY’s push to implement an unattainable efficiency requirement on these products would severally impact the industry. I led a bipartisan letter to @ENERGY about this overreaching requirement.

.@housebudgetGOP has put together a principled budget resolution that gives our country the opportunity to reduce the out-of-control spending, improve the debt-to-GDP ratio, and promote fiscal responsibility through economic growth.

Since Biden took office, over 5.8 million illegal border crossings have taken place - & the lack of any action by this admin to secure our borders is only enabling massive surges like this to take place. 

Border security is national security.

Today we celebrate 76 years of the @usairforce protecting our skies and defending our nation. 

Thank you to the men and women - past & present - of the U.S. Air Force for your outstanding valor and patriotic service. 🇺🇸
We are excited to welcome @ussoccer HQ and National Training Center to the Peach State!
It was great to see my longtime dentist friend - and Columbus native - Jerry Adams, and his wife, prior to their Capitol tour this morning!

Happy National Peanut Day! 

We tip our hats to the hardworking Georgia peanut farmers and the incredible Georgia-grown peanuts they produce. #NationalPeanutDay

Twenty-two years ago our world changed forever.

As we reflect on the tragic events of September 11th, we will #NeverForget the lives lost, bravery of first responders, and the indomitable spirit of America. 🇺🇸

The Biden Administration’s move to cancel oil & gas leases in Alaska is completely absurd. 

Not only will folks continue to feel the pain at the pump, but it increases America’s dependency on our adversaries for oil - a major threat to national security.

Thank you to Dr. Don Nakayama for the tour of Mercer University School of Medicine’s Columbus campus. They do important training for medical students and conduct impactful medical research at their Columbus campus.

The drug crisis has impacted every single community across the country. 

Today on #OverdoseAwarenessDay, we remember those lost to an overdose, acknowledge the grief of the family and friends left behind, and renew our commitment to end overdoses.

Today’s grand opening of the historic Ralston towers marks a major transformation - and a new beginning - for affordable housing in the Columbus community.

It took the efforts of local, state, and federal officials, & I’m proud to see this major success.

My good friend @SteveScalise is a fighter, and I’m confident he will overcome this battle.

Julie and I are sending prayers to Steve and his family for a speedy recovery. 🙏

Sending my condolences and prayers to the family, friends, and loved ones of Maj. Andrew Mettler.

Stopped by Thunderwood Farms in Woodbury this week to visit and tour their perennial plants operation. 

Thank you to Lori & Gray Riner for having me, and for the insightful discussion about current challenges in the farming business. #GA03

It was great to visit Lily Hill Farm - a cattle farm in Troup County - and talk with owners Avery & Marc Wrigglesworth.

We toured the farm and discussed the real challenges they face due to federal regulations in their cattle farming process.

It’s clear Biden’s border crisis extends beyond our southern border, & the gateways for trafficking fentanyl must be fully addressed. 

I’m proud to add my name to @RepJenniffer’s Caribbean Border Counternarcotics Strategy Act to stop these deadly drugs from pouring into the U.S.

Important notice for all #GA03 Veterans: The VA has extended the deadline through Monday, August 14, 2023 for Veterans and survivors to apply for PACT Act benefits backdated to August 10, 2022. 

For more information and to apply: va.gov/resources/the-pact-ac…

Great to start the day meeting with business and community leaders at the Fayette Chamber of Commerce breakfast. I gave a legislative update and took questions from folks in attendance. 

Thanks for having me - and for your leadership in our community! #GA03

Appreciate the @GAChamber having me this morning for a breakout session with Commissioner Christopher Nunn.

We discussed the housing shortage in Georgia & policies at the state and federal levels that can help drive down costs and address this pressing issue.

On #PurpleHeartDay, we honor and remember the true meaning of bravery and selflessness - and express our deepest gratitude to the brave individuals who've been awarded the Purple Heart. 

Your courage, sacrifice, and resilience is an inspiration to us all. 🇺🇸

Thousands of folks rely on programs provided through schools to learn firearm & hunting safety.

This misinterpretation of the law by the Biden Administration is an attack 
on Americans practicing their second amendment right and is completely ridiculous.

Americans are continuing to grapple with the impacts of Biden’s inflation & economic crisis.

Consumers are still feeling strapped from the past two years of higher-than-normal price increases.

Upgrades to @SocialSecurity's IT systems continue to be delayed, causing failures in delivering services to Americans in a timely manner.

Today I sent a letter to @USGAO requesting a full review of how SSA manages & oversees billions of dollars in IT investments.

The IRS whistleblowers were denied the ability to authenticate evidence, serve warrants, question witnesses, & bring charges in the Hunter Biden tax crimes investigation.

@WaysandMeansGOP is pulling back the curtain & exposing Biden’s two tiered system of justice.

Not only is it wrong for the Biden admin to unilaterally surrender U.S. tax dollars to foreign governments, but it’s unconstitutional without approval from Congress.

We must remain focused on making America the best place in the world to do business.

Israel has long been one of our staunchest allies as the only democracy in the Middle East.

Thank you President Herzog for speaking to Congress and commemorating the 75th year of Israel’s statehood.

I will always stand with Israel.

Thank you to law enforcement officials from Henry & Clayton County - and supporting state officials - for tracking this man down and ending such a tragic situation.

The senseless act of evil has devastated our community and my heart is with the families of the four individuals.

Proud to support the passage of the #NDAA out of the House today. This vital bill hardens America’s industrial base and enhances military readiness to ensure our modern warfighters are the best equipped and trained in the world.

Exciting news from @Kia as they recently announced a $200 million electric SUV expansion at their West Point plant - which will add 200 jobs!

Our #GA03 community is very proud of the great work being done at Kia!

It was great to attend the @HealthInFocus Expo and speak with representatives from Leidos, Johnson & Johnson, City of Hope, and Ontada about their work. 

I was honored to receive the Healthcare Leadership Council Award for my work to support patient-centered medical progress.

.@SBAgov recently opened a Disaster Loan Outreach Center at the Troup Baptist Association in LaGrange to assist #GA03 business owners, non-profits, homeowners & renters impacted by the severe storms that occurred on March 25-27, 2023.

Happy #IndependenceDay!

May God bless America, the land of the free because of the brave.

No matter our differences, we are one nation, and one people. Together, we will always stand stronger. 🇺🇸

The Supreme Court ruling on Biden’s student loan handouts appropriately recognizes that the administration lacked the authority to unilaterally implement this program - & needed Congressional approval.

It’s a victory for the Constitution, and every hardworking American taxpayer.

Today’s Supreme Court decision is a major win and will create a fairer college admissions process. 

Race should never be the reason any American is denied educational opportunities.

There is clearly a double-standard of justice under the Biden Administration.

No American would ever be able to walk away from over $300,000 in unpaid taxes.

Even the Dems admit that Hunter Biden received preferential treatment for evading his tax obligations.
It was great to have my longtime friend Madhu - and his son - stop by the office before the Joint Session of Congress with PM @narendramodi.

It was an honor to stop by the stamp unveiling event of the late Rep. John Lewis yesterday. 

John was a leader with a humble heart whose tenacity will be remembered for generations.
Thank you to the participants of the annual Washington Youth Tour offered by @Georgia_EMC. It was great to speak and engage with such bright young leaders!

More jobs are coming to #GA03! 

Today, @PrattAndWhitney announced they are investing $206 million to expand operations in Muscogee County - creating 400 new jobs!

We are proud to see their continued investment in our local community!

One of my greatest blessings in life is being a dad!

Wishing all fathers - and grandfathers - a Happy Father’s Day!

I am proud to join @RepDeSaulnier to introduce the bipartisan Fair and Open Skies Act.

Our bill ensures fair labor standards for all airlines in the U.S. are upheld and strengthens America’s ability to regulate unfair business practices by foreign carriers.

Underserved communities have seen strong economic growth thanks to investment in Opportunity Zones. The Rural Opportunity Zone & Investment Act builds on this success specifically in our rural communities. 

Proud to have my bill included in the @WaysandMeansGOP economic package.

The American flag is a powerful symbol that embodies the resilience and freedom of our great nation.

On #FlagDay, we unite in gratitude and commitment to preserving the principles that make our nation strong. 🇺🇸

Today we celebrate 248 years of bravery and selfless service by our soldiers. 

Thank you to all Army personnel, past and present, for your unwavering commitment to safeguarding the freedoms we hold dear. #USArmyBirthday

Calling all students & recent graduates in #GA03! My District & DC offices are now accepting Fall internship applications! 

This is a great opportunity to get a firsthand look at the inner workings of Congress. The deadline to apply is July 14 at 5p.

Honored to receive the Champion of Limited Government Award from @leganalysis for my work in Congress to fight for the limited government principles of the U.S. Constitution. I remain committed to keeping big-government in check.

We know that having a single point of contact at the Social Security Administration will help folks dealing with identity theft get their issue resolved more efficiently.

At today’s @WaysandMeansGOP markup, I offered my bill to streamline this process.

Antimicrobial resistance is a public health crisis and if left unaddressed, could one day become our next pandemic.

The #PASTEURAct is a bipartisan, bicameral solution that brings together the public & private sectors to develop novel antibiotics.

Today we honor the 79th anniversary of #DDay, a crucial moment when Allied forces landed on the beaches of Normandy to begin what became the liberation of France.

May God bless those brave men & women - & their families - who answered the call as we recognize their sacrifice.

Today - and everyday - we honor & remember the selfless servicemembers who made the ultimate sacrifice protecting our nation and the freedoms we hold so dear.

The memory of our heroes will never be forgotten. 🇺🇸 #MemorialDay

It’s clear that Washington, D.C. has a spending problem. It’s simply not sustainable and we must get our fiscal house in order.

@HouseGOP’s Limit, Save, Grow Act makes reasonable changes with which most Americans agree.

.@HouseGOP passed a responsible debt limit bill which adheres to the principles of fiscal discipline, & ensures our country doesn’t default on our debt.

America, and Americans, can't continue to ignore the reckless spending that got us into this mess in the first place.

.@POTUS refused to talk about the debt limit for months - so @HouseGOP came together to pass the Limit, Save, Grow Act which would reduce our nation’s deficit by $4.8 trillion over the next 10 years.

It's long past time we get our fiscal house under control.

Joining @Newsmax American Agenda today at 3pm - tune in!

Congress must act!

On this #MothersDay, I thank my wife, Julie, and all the dedicated mothers - and grandmothers - across the country who make such a lasting difference in our lives.

Happy Mother’s Day!

The @CBP has been hamstrung by Biden’s open border policies.

The @HouseGOP Border Security bill passed today provides Title 42-like authority and ends catch & release while providing funding for the wall and more agents. 

It’s time for Biden to wake up to this crisis!

As if the American people weren’t already stretched thin and getting crushed by inflation…

This ridiculous big-government overreach would further devastate our nation’s energy security - and with no current alternative to replace power plants, energy prices will skyrocket.

Since Biden took office, @CBP has encountered over 5 million illegal migrants at our southern border - but the admin continues to turn a blind eye to this out-of-control crisis.

@HouseGOP will act this week to secure our border & combat this national security crisis.

These student loan handouts are fundamentally unfair - and this authoritarian move by the Biden admin to bypass Congress is unconstitutional.

Hardworking Americans are not responsible for paying off the student loan debt of others.

This is yet more wasteful spending.

Antibiotics make modern medicine possible - but the U.S. is at risk of losing these critical drugs.

The #PASTEURAct brings together the public & private sectors to address drug development market failures and helps usher in a new era of antibiotics.

This outpatient facility - which offers primary care & specialty health services - will ensure veterans in our #GA03 community receive timely & accessible care that meets their unique needs.

Along with a group of my GOP colleagues, we had important discussions on a range of topics with facility staff, and toured both the Lab Training Facility and Antimicrobial Resistance Lab.

He is Risen!

Wishing #GA03 a blessed and holy Easter Sunday.

Thank you to Ferrell Blair, owner of LJL Ranch, for hosting me at his farm this morning. 

We discussed a number of issues farmers in Troup County are facing, and solutions to how we can best help our local farmers. #GA03

Prior to this administration, America was the largest energy producer & gas prices were affordable.

Biden’s war on domestic energy drove energy prices to historic highs. 

Today, the House will pass H.R. 1 - the Lower Energy Costs Act - to unleash American energy dominance.

.@HouseGOP’s Lower Energy Costs Act will bring American energy dominance by:

➡️ Increasing domestic energy production

➡️ Reversing Biden's anti-energy policies

➡️ Streamlining energy infrastructure & exports

➡️ Boosting the production & processing of critical minerals

On day 1, Biden waged an all-out war on American energy independence causing energy prices to skyrocket.

@HouseGOP is committed to bringing back American energy dominance & our signature bill, H.R. 1 - the Lower Energy Costs Act - will restore our domestic energy industry.

I joined Troup County Commissioner Lewis Davis to survey the damage from the severe storms & tornadoes.

For the last 2 years, the Dems dumped trillions of dollars into a recovering economy to appease liberal special interests. As a result of this radical spending & big-gov socialist policies, inflation skyrocketed & continues to impact Americans as the cost of everyday goods go up.

Prior to the Dems passing their American Rescue Plan, inflation was at 2%. Instead of giving the economy time to recover, Dems rammed though a big-gov bill that skyrocketed inflation to over 9%. 

It’s clear unnecessary radical-Left spending drove inflation to a 40-year high.

Parent’s always deserve a seat at the table when it comes to their child’s education. 

This week, @HouseGOP will vote on the Parent’s Bill of Rights - which will ensure parents always have a say in their children’s education & makes clear the duties schools have to parents.

SmartLam does great work producing mass timber products for use in the construction of sustainable buildings.

I’m proud to receive a 100% score card from the @GaLifeAlliance - the National Right to Life affiliate in Georgia - for supporting pro-life legislation in Congress. 

I remain committed to fostering a culture that defends our most vulnerable in Georgia - and across America.

The folks at Bremen Bowdon Investment Company manufacture U.S. military uniforms at their plant in Bowdon.

It was a pleasure to speak with President Al Griffin and the folks at Meriwether County Rotary Club.

I’m proud to have organizations in #GA03 that actively work to positively impact our local community.

Thank you to Retired Colonel Andy Redmond, Retired General Pete Jones, & the folks at the National @infantrymuseum for hosting me.

The museum is home to one of the greatest collections of military artifacts in the world & highlights the values that define America’s Infantrymen.

 Thanks for having me!

@HouseGOP will hold this administration accountable & ensure our nation moves forward in a fiscally responsible way.

On his first day in office, Biden waged war on American energy and destroyed U.S. energy security.
 
More than two years later, hardworking Americans are still paying the price with sky high energy costs.
 
It’s long past time we establish American energy independence.

Americans have seen not just higher prices at the store, but empty shelves & closed doors. 
 
Joe Biden’s policies rewarded folks for sitting on the sidelines instead of returning to work – directly leading our economy into a supply chain crisis & worker shortage.

For 50 years, Chief Lou Dekmar has protected our communities as a law enforcement officer. His unwavering dedication to ensuring the folks of Troup County stayed safe & secure was second to none. Thank you for your unbelievable devotion to serving & congratulations on retirement.

I provided a legislative update to the group and answered questions. We also had a great discussion about fiscal responsibility.

Since @POTUS has been in office, over 4.5 MILLION illegal crossings have occurred at our southern border.

December alone had the highest number of crossings ever recorded. This historic crisis is only getting worse - & @HouseGOP will keep fighting to hold this admin accountable.

As we celebrate National School Choice Week, we’re reminded of the importance of creating an education system that enables #schoolchoice & ensures every parent’s voice is heard.

Thank you to all parents, teachers, & administrators who are dedicated to educating our children.

I provided a legislative update, took questions, and had an insightful discussion about important issues facing homebuilders. 

Thank you for having me!

Thank you to everyone who has come to DC to celebrate the right to life.

Life begins at conception and I will always stand up to protect our nation’s most vulnerable in Congress.

We will never stop fighting to protect every precious life, born and unborn.

Today, @SBAgov will open Business Recovery Centers at the Locust Grove Public Library in Henry County, & at the William Griggs Recreation Center in Troup County, to assist with applying for SBA disaster loans for losses due to severe storms & tornadoes on Jan. 12.

Sending prayers to my friend @RepGregSteube and his family for a speedy recovery. 🙏

Georgia homeowners & renters in the Third District (Henry, Meriwether, Spalding & Troup Counties) impacted by the severe storms & tornadoes on Jan. 12 may apply for FEMA disaster assistance.

A full breakdown on what information is needed, and how to apply can be found below:

A Major Disaster Declaration has been issued for the State of GA following last week’s severe storms. Individuals impacted in Henry, Meriwether, Spalding, & Troup Counties can apply for assistance by:

➡️ Visiting DisasterAssistance.gov
➡️ Calling 1-800-621-3362

Today we honor the inspirational life and legacy of Martin Luther King Jr.

His commitment to serving others and message of freedom & equality continue to inspire young hearts and minds across our country. #MLKDay

Not only did Biden destroy our energy independence, but he depleted our strategic reserve & compromised national security by selling these crucial reserves to Communist China.

Today, we will vote to hold this admin accountable & ensure no sales of our SPR are sold to China.

This is extremely alarming & another gruesome reality American communities will face thanks to this administration’s open border agenda.
